message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and could greatly benefit you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could you consider $13,000? I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still unable to meet at $13,000. I would like to propose $11,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
